column2:
"You were awesome back there!
But those automata were off the
charts. Like, crazy hard!"

"Wouldn't it be great if we could build
a control system or something that
could stop 'em dead in their tracks? "

"But no use wishing for the impossible,
right?"

"Well, see ya, partner. I hope you'll be around
the next time I need you!"

"相棒、お疲れ！
機甲種の相手もなかなか骨が
折れるもんだよな。"

"制御装置とかそういうの作って
一気にドカンと動きを止めたり
できないもんかなぁ。"

"ま、ないものねだりしても
仕方がないか。"

"んじゃな、相棒。
またなんかあったらよろしくな！"
